resources.string: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Curabitur finibus tempor turpis. Suspendisse tristique, dui ac gravida mattis, orci erat tempus turpis, id dignissim purus velit ut massa. Mauris scelerisque, velit eget rhoncus ultrices, mauris ex hendrerit tellus, id volutpat est nibh eu neque. Quisque rutrum, erat eget iaculis bibendum.
This is just sample app to show main features of QuickTutorial library.

QuickTutorial helps you to make minimalistic start guides on just one expression!

It has lots of build-in features, but if you need more, you can simply extend them by using custom activities, fragments and controllers!

Let's quickly overview main features of this library! Click next button or simply swipe on the screen to go to the next page.

This is simple text screen.
It consists of the title and text.


Nothing else in case you need really minimalistic page.

Well, on the previous page I just showed some pie chart.

Now, let's combine this text with my picture from Norway.

Simply add all the data that you need.
That\'s it from now.\nWe are updating this library all the time, so stay tuned!
